welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aldenhoven, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our picturesque town and discover its rich history and culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aldenhoven has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
